info.title: Site Information
info.p1_1: This site is clearly inspired by
info.p1_3: in its style and choice of inquisitive name. Course data is bi-annually collected from the systems of the
info.p1_5: but reviews have been manually collected from the web where applicable or submitted directly by students within this site.
info.p2_1: On the site you will find ratings in
info.p2_2: which refer to the quality of teaching accompanied by ratings in
info.p2_3: which refer to the workload instead. You can find
info.p3_1: The site was created to allow students to share their opinions on courses in terms of both quality and workload in a clear and intuitive way. The idea comes from similar sites such as
info.p3_3: which also allow students not yet enrolled to start gathering information about their future course of study.
info.p4_1: My name is Demetrio Battaglia, I am currently a Computer Science student at the University of Trento and I work part-time as a developer at Fondazione Bruno Kessler. You can visit my personal website at
info.p5_1: To keep this site online, that is to cover the costs of the server and the domain, I personally make available a small sum of money on an annual basis. If you want to help me cover these costs, or want to express appreciation for this work, you can make a donation through Ko-fi. Any amount is immensely appreciated.
info.p6_1: As much as you want. Below you can see how much of the costs of
info.p6_2: have been covered by donations. I periodically update this page manually, so you may not see your donation immediately.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: Welcome to "Chi lo tiene..." (the "Service"). This is a personal project. This page informs you of the policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use the Service and the choices you have associated with that data.
privacy.p2: Your data is used to provide the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacy.p3: The Service collects several different types of information for various purposes to provide the Service.
privacy.p4: While using the Service, you may be asked to provide certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:
privacy.p5: Information may also be collected on how the Service is accessed and used ("Usage Data"). This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of the Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
privacy.p6: The collected data is used for various purposes:
privacy.li3: To provide and maintain the Service
privacy.li4: To manage your account and provide you with support
privacy.li5: To communicate with you, for example, by sending emails for account verification or other transactional purposes using services like Resend.
privacy.li6: To monitor the usage of the Service, analyze data for service improvement, and ensure security.
privacy.li7: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues.
privacy.p7: The security of your data is important. Steps are taken to protect your data, including:
privacy.li9: Using industry-standard security measures to protect the servers and database.
privacy.p8: However, remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While commercially acceptable means are used to protect your Personal Data, absolute security cannot be guaranteed.
privacy.p9: Your Personal Data is not sold, traded, or rented to others. Your information may be shared with third-party service providers to facilitate the Service, such as for sending emails (e.g., Resend) or hosting the application and database. These third parties are obligated to protect your information and are not authorized to use it for any other purpose.
privacy.p10: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy.li10: – You have the right to request copies of your personal data.
privacy.li11: – You have the right to request the correction of any information you believe is inaccurate.
privacy.li12: – You have the right to request the erasure of your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacy.li13: – You have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacy.h6_b5: The right to object to processing
privacy.li14: – You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
privacy.li15: – You have the right to request the transfer of the data that has been collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
privacy.p11: If you make a request, a response will be provided within one month. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please use the contact information below.
privacy.p12: The Service uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on the Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of the Service. Cookies are primarily used for session management (e.g., keeping you logged in).
privacy.p13: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. You will be notified of any changes by the posting of the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
privacy.p14: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact me at:

signup.title: Sign up
signup.success_message: You have successfully signed up. Please check your e-mail to confirm your account.
signup.cannot_login_message: Please note you cannot log in until you have confirmed your account. However, you can still access the website as a guest.
signup.resent_message: The e-mail has been sent again. Please check your inbox and spam folder. If you still did not receive it, please contact us at
signup.email_body:
Hello,

I did not receive the confirmation e-mail twice. Could you please help me?
The e-mail address I used is {email}. [add any relevant detail that might help]
signup.not_received_message: Did you not receive the e-mail? Please check your spam folder or
signup.full_name_description: It will not be shared unless you explicitly allow it.
signup.email_address_description: Please provide your institutional e-mail address.
signup.privacy_policy_agreement_1: I have read and I accept the
signup.privacy_policy_description: Your data is never used for marketing or profiling activities. It will only be shared with service providers for the purpose of providing the service.

feedback.title: Feedback Form
feedback.description: If you have encountered a problem or have a suggestion to improve the site, you can send me feedback, I will be happy to receive it and eventually, if you leave a contact, to answer you. You can use Markdown to format the text, if necessary.
